Vocab 3

Nige' gna'si.

Now get dressed.

Ula nasa'tu (pita'qwe'ji'tl, pita'qawe'l, signn)

Put this on (...).

Ula nasa'l (lamqwan, atla'i)

Put this on (...).

Tegen atla'i getu'-nasgat?

Which shirt do you want to wear?

Nasa'tu waqame'gl pita'qawe'l.

Put on clean pants.

Unaqatija'tu.

Slide it up (zipper).

'Spisuna'si.

Put on a belt.

Tami etegl 'gtisignn? Nmisge'n.

Where are your socks? Go get them.

Tami epijig gmugsng? Nmisgu.

Where are your shoes?

Signa'si.

Put socks on.

'Mg'sn nasa'l.

Put on the shoe.

'Mg'sna'si.

Put shoes on.

Ilaqpo'l gmugsng.

Lace up your shoes.

Glusgulsi.

Button yourself up.

Glusgul na 'gtatla'im.

Button up your shirt.

Napitoqo'l na 'gtatla'im.

Button up your shirt.[same as above].

Napitoqo'lsi.

Button yourself up.

  • Next Dialog→
